Text: Trading Compliance Proceduresyou for having taken the time to meet with me I am enclosing for your information a generic set of compliance procedures suited to a trading environment This type of policy document could be a part of a group of materials and training programs aimed at avoiding market abuse and anticompetitive behavior and in any event controlling any damage from any violative conduct by demonstrating the companys diligent good faith efforts to comply with applicable law and regulation If you wish to pursue this further we would be delighted to assist Since the real value of such a program comes from marrying general legal principles with relevant market situations I would suggest that materials and training focus on well crafted businessspecific hypotheticals and that legal principals be explained to the degree necessary to address those situations and the project involve a close collaboration whereby you supply insights into the relevant business situations and we prepare the written materials which are then used in a video taped training sessions at your office in which we jointly present and analyze the hypotheticals with an emphasis on taking questions and providing practical approaches David Yeres Clifford Chance Rogers Wells Park Avenue New York NY Tel Fax email DOC This message and any attachment are confidential and may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient please telephone or email the sender and delete this message and any attachment from your system If you are not the intended recipient you must not copy this message or attachment or disclose the contents to any other person For further information about Clifford Chance please see our website at or refer to any Clifford Chance office DOC

REdo Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April PM To David liffordChancecom Subject Re David It was good to see you also I am only available on the th I would like you to come to Enron and talk about the audit and certain key provisions in the trading agreements with the top trading lawyers Give Mark Taylor a call at he is GC of the financial trading Regards Mark David lifford Chancecom To cc Mark liffordChancecom Claude liffordChancecom PM Kersten liffordChancecom Subject Mark it was good to see you Thursday My next visit to Houston is scheduled for May and I will be making a presentation concerning the legal consequences of market abuse in electricity trading to a Risk Magazine Conference on the th As we discussed last week I would if you wish be pleased to speak to your colleagues on the same subject during my visit I would also be pleased to discuss the contract audit issues focusing on the key provisions that have been or we expect to be critical from a financial or reputational perspective In that regard it would be helpful to discuss Enron experience with agreementsprovisions before finalizing my remarks Perhaps you could identify someone on your staff with whom I may speak Best regards David Yeres Clifford Chance Rogers Wells LLP Park Avenue New York NY Tel Fax Email This message and any attachment are confidential and may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient please telephone or email the sender and delete this message and any attachment from your system If you are not the intended recipient you must not copy this message or attachment or disclose the contents to any other person For further information about Clifford Chance please see our website at or refer to any Clifford Chance office

FW Proposed Audit PresentationMark Further to mine of June th do you think there is any continuing interest in your shop for the contract audit matter we discussed By the way was Enrons building spared in the recent floods that we read about Regards David Original Message From Yeres David Financial ProductsNY Sent Friday June PM To Subject Proposed Audit Presentation Mark I havent heard back on scheduling the contract audit presentation Is this on the back burner or have you decided not to proceed at this time David Yeres Clifford Chance Rogers Wells Park Avenue New York NY Tel Fax email This message and any attachment are confidential and may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient please telephone or email the sender and delete this message and any attachment from your system If you are not the intended recipient you must not copy this message or attachment or disclose the contents to any other person For further information about Clifford Chance please see our website at or refer to any Clifford Chance office

RE Proposed Audit PresentationMark lets talk if Mark H is still interested I am sure we could work out some convenient date in Sept Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday July PM To IMCEANOTESDavidEYeresCliffordChanceEcom NRONcom Subject RE Proposed Audit Presentation David Apologies for my silence I need to check with Mark H and make sure he is still on board but I think it is a good idea and would suggest we try and schedule something for early September Mark Original Message From David liffordChance NRON mailtoIMCEANOTESDavidEYeresCliffordChanceEcom NRONcom Sent Wednesday July AM To Taylor Mark E Legal Subject FW Proposed Audit Presentation Mark Is this still of interest David Yeres Original Message From Yeres David Financial ProductsNY Sent Tuesday June PM To Subject FW Proposed Audit Presentation Mark Further to mine of June th do you think there is any continuing interest in your shop for the contract audit matter we discussed By the way was Enrons building spared in the recent floods that we read about Regards David Original Message From Yeres David Financial ProductsNY Sent Friday June PM To Subject Proposed Audit Presentation Mark I havent heard back on scheduling the contract audit presentation Is this on the back burner or have you decided not to proceed at this time David Yeres Clifford Chance Rogers Wells Park Avenue New York NY Tel Fax email This message and any attachment are confidential and may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient please telephone or email the sender and delete this message and any attachment from your system If you are not the intended recipient you must not copy this message or attachment or disclose the contents to any other person For further information about Clifford Chance please see our website at or refer to any Clifford Chance office
